testcase.classname: Recently looked Item Should be present in the history
testcase.name: User Should be able to look items that was previously viewed
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the browser.............................................passed When User open the amazon application and clicked on signin button and check if you went on that page or not.passed When User enters username and click on next button..........................passed And User enters password and Click on submitt button........................passed Then Check if user is on home page signed with account......................passed And User type in the search box and click on the search button..............passed And User clicks on some product to view details and then goes back to home page.passed And User scroll down in the home page and clicks on view history link.......passed Then check if previosly viewed product is there or not......................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the country change
testcase.name: User Should be able to open website of selected country
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the browser.............................................passed When User open the amazon application.......................................passed And User hover on country icon..............................................passed And User click on change country icon link..................................passed And Check we are on country change page and click on country drop-down.....passed And User selelcts country...................................................passed Then User clicks on Go to WebSite button....................................passed Then check if user is on changed country website............................passed
